sources.title: Temptation
sources.description: Ruby, a beautiful divorcee with a shady past, marries a rich Egyptologist, and while he continues excavating a Pharoah's tomb, she becomes bored until she falls for a debt-ridden, blackmailing Egyptian prince.

sources.title: Temptation | Full Movie | Fantasy Vampire Horror
sources.description:
Beautiful, young Isabel is out on the town with friends. One too many is the least of her problems when she is saved from the clutches of a serial mugger by an ancient but gorgeous vampire, Aurelie- but at what cost? Now under Aurelie's spell and with an intensifying taste for blood, Isabel has only 48 hours to decide whether to give in to her cravings or end it all before it's too late.
2009.  Stars: Caroline Haines, Laura Evans, Rachel Waters
*Licensed from Breaking Glass Pictures. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: The carpenter, Jesus of Nazareth, tormented by the temptations of demons, the guilt of making crosses for the Romans, pity for men and the world, and the constant call of God, sets out to find what God wills for Him. But as His mission nears fulfillment, He must face the greatest temptation; the normal life of a good man. Based, not on the Gospels, but on Nikos Kazantzakis' novel of the same name.
metadata.Actors: Willem Dafoe, Harvey Keitel, Paul Greco
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 2 wins & 7 nominations total
